name: Triple Words II Quiz | Drop a Letter | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Example question: Aspect - dial - expert
    Answer: FACET (drop 'T' to make FACE, drop 'F' to make ACE)

Swift -run away - shelter
questions.explanation:
Fleet & Fleet flee lee.

	Fleet - flee - lee.

Twine & Twine twin win.

	Twine - twin - win.

questions.text: Plank of wood - male hog - paddle
questions.explanation:
Board & Board boar oar.

	Board - boar - oar.

Stool & Stool tool too.

	Stool - tool - too.

Silly & Silly sill ill.

	Silly - sill - ill.

Swarm & Swarm warm war.

	Swarm - warm - war.

Amend & Amend amen men.

	Amend - amen - men.

Speak & Speak peak pea.

	Speak - peak - pea.

Stare & Stare star tar.

	Stare - star - tar.

Irate & Irate rate rat.

	Irate - rate - rat.
